DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective evaluate improvement antidepressant monotherapy depressive anxiety symptom Chinese patient meet Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fifth Edition ( DSM-5 ) criteria comorbidity major depressive disorder ( MDD ) generalize anxiety disorder ( GAD )
DOC.brief_title: Antidepressant Monotherapy Depressive Anxiety Symptom Chinese Patients
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate improvement quality life antidepressant monotherapy Chinese patient meet DSM-5 criterion comorbidity MDD GAD . To monitor adverse event ( AEs ) serious adverse event ( SAEs ) antidepressant monotherapy
DOC.criteria: 1 . First episode outpatient department psychiatry , age 1865 year 2 . Comorbidity MDD GAD accord DSM5 criterion Hamilton Depression score ( HAMD ) ≥18 screen 3 . HAMA≥14 screen 4 . Medically stable 5 . Provision write , informed consent . 1 . Suicide ideation 2 . Use antidepressant within least 14 day study begin 3 . Substance alcohol dependence enrolment ( except dependence full remission , except caffeine nicotine dependence ) 4 . Opiates , amphetamine , barbiturate , cocaine , cannabis , hallucinogen abuse within 4 week prior enrolment 5 . Unstable inadequately treat medical illness ( e.g . congestive heart failure , angina pectoris , hypertension , renal hepatic dysfunction , cerebrovascular disease ) judge investigator 6 . Women pregnancy lactation 7 . Medical condition would affect absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion study treatment . 8 . Medical history seizure disorder , except febrile convulsion 9 . Participation another clinical study within 4 week ( long time accord local requirement ) 10 . Receive Electroconvulsive therapy ( ECT ) study begin
